property.description: Selects if code for parameter checking is to be included in the build.

constraint.display: Module instances must have unique names
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: Specify which graphics screen is inherited.
A user callback function can be provided. If this callback function is provided, it will be called when an event occurs.

constraint.display: Specifiy the Name of user callback function

property.description: Select the clockwise screen rotation angle in degrees. If nonzero value is selected, screen rotation is enabled and GUIX draws screen image on a frame buffer, rotating the image with the angle in the counter clockwise way.

property.display: GUIX Canvas Buffer (required if rotation angle is not zero)
property.description: If enabling the screen rotation, a canvas buffer must be used. The size of canvas buffer must be the same as a frame buffer for the display module.

property.display: Size of JPEG Work Buffer (valid if JPEG hardware acceleration enabled)
property.description: Specify the JPEG work buffer size in bytes. Value must be a valid integer value and zero is allowed to be set if JPEG acceleration is not used. Larger buffer size shortens the drawing time.

constraint.display: Specifiy the Name of JPEG Work Buffer(0 is allowed if JPEG is not used)

property.display: Memory section for GUIX Canvas Buffer
property.description: Specify the memory section where the GUIX Canvas Buffer will be allocated.

constraint.display: This property must be a valid section name

property.display: Memory section for JPEG Work Buffer
property.description: Specify the memory section where the JPEG Work Buffer will be allocated.

constraint.display: This property must be a valid section name

property.display: D/AVE 2D Frame Buffer Cache(Valid if D/AVE 2D Drawing Engine is enabled)
property.description: If Synergy 2D Drawing Engine (DRW) Support is enabled, the rotation is processed by Synergy DRW with texture mapping. If not enabled, the rotation is processed by software copy.
